item.title: Review: Stellar cast makes Superman shine bright
item.description: James Gunn’s entertaining reboot has a few flaws but so much heart—and wow, that stellar cast.

item.title: ‘Superman’ Lands in Hollywood, ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ Arrives and This Week’s Best Events
item.description: Inside this week’s biggest Hollywood premieres, parties and openings.

item.title: Stop, Already, With Superhero Movies Ending With Big, Dumb CG Smash Battles
item.description: James Gunn’s ‘Superman’ is great until it climaxes with the same numbing effects-overkill as most other Marvel/DC efforts. It’s time to find another way to end these movies.

item.title: Box Office: James Gunn’s ‘Superman’ Soars to $22.5 Million in Previews
item.description: The movie — launching a new era for DC Studios — scored the top preview gross of the year to date.
